com.seatcode.robotread.domain.services

Class MeasureScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.seatcode.robotread.domain.services.MeasureScheduler

  • public class MeasureScheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    The entity is used to measure every 33 seconds which is the time obtained from the formula t=d/v. In the same way, it generates a report every 15 minutes. And the method to stop the scheduler
    Author:
    despinosa
